GSD.description:
usbnet: Run unregister_netdev() before unbind() again

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 6d5deb242874d924beccf7eb3cef04c1c3b0da79. For more details please see the references link.
